subject: Question about Shipment schedule
description_text:
﻿
Hi

I ordered about 2 weeks ago.
I want to know when you make a shipment.
Please leave the massage.

Order #SSN1971



Best regards,

오대관 (DK, Oh)

From iPhone

conversations.body_text: ID 为 1883 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单1883  
      主题: Question about Shipment schedule  
      描述:  Hi  I ordered about 2 weeks ago. I want to know when you make a shipment. Please leave the massage.   Best regards,  오대관 (DK, Oh)  From iPhone

Hi 오대관,     Sorry, the white dampers are out of stock, and there are no plans to restock the old model dampers. You can choose two sets of other dampers, including our new model dampers. Alternatively, we can cancel your order.

Thank you for your massage.
I want to get weaker dampers almost 35ha.
If it is out of stock, please cancel the order.



Best regards,

오대관 (DK, Oh)

From iPhone
